rubrics.rubric: Uremic symptoms: dullness, confusion, memory loss
rubrics.modality: Dull, blank expression; slow to answer; confused in familiar places
rubrics.notes: CNS impact of advanced kidney failure

rubrics.rubric: Oliguria or suppressed urine with general dropsy
rubrics.modality: Scanty or no urine, facial puffiness, dependent edema

rubrics.rubric: Fear of death with physical exhaustion
rubrics.modality: Feels life is slipping away; restless; needs company

rubrics.rubric: Uremic coma or drowsiness with suppressed urine
rubrics.modality: Loss of consciousness, no desire to wake or speak
rubrics.notes: Life-threatening CNS symptoms in renal failure

rubrics.rubric: Chronic kidney damage with diabetes mellitus
rubrics.modality: Sugar + protein in urine, progressive decline

rubrics.rubric: Edema of face, especially under eyes (renal origin)
rubrics.modality: Early morning swelling under eyes

rubrics.rubric: Back pain in renal region with urinary dysfunction
rubrics.modality: Pain radiating forward, worse movement
rubrics.notes: Functional indicator of inflammation or stasis

rubrics.rubric: Albuminuria with emaciation and exhaustion
rubrics.modality: Loss of flesh and energy, face pale, sunken

rubrics.rubric: Irritation of bladder with scanty high-colored urine
rubrics.modality: Smoky, offensive urine with heat or pressure

rubrics.rubric: Uremic itching, worse at night
rubrics.modality: Burning, crawling, restless skin; non-eruptive

rubrics.rubric: CKD cases with poor response to indicated remedies
rubrics.modality: History of suppressed eruptions, long-term drug use, or family history of renal/cancer/tubercular illness
rubrics.notes: Given as intercurrent to open case, clear suppression

rubrics.rubric: CKD with strong syphilitic background: degeneration, ulcers, loss of function
rubrics.modality: Violent disease descent, worsening with modern suppressive treatment
rubrics.notes: Chosen to break down deep degenerative layers

rubrics.rubric: CKD with tubercular traits: emaciation, restlessness, hyperactive mind, inherited TB background
rubrics.modality: Wasting despite good appetite; chilly; desires stimulants
rubrics.notes: Often hidden miasm in CKD with childhood respiratory history

rubrics.rubric: CKD in patients with emotional suppression, grief, and trauma history
rubrics.modality: Kidney disease follows divorce, loss, humiliation, suppressed anger

rubrics.rubric: CKD with recurrent infections, antibiotic suppressions, or nephrotic complications
rubrics.modality: Recurrent UTIs, antibiotics for years; low immunity
rubrics.notes: Chronic suppression and over-medication key indicators

rubrics.rubric: CKD with complete absence of eruptions since childhood (dry skin, suppressed constitution)
rubrics.modality: Dry constitution, chilly, cannot perspire; never well since suppressed eczema or eruptions

rubrics.rubric: End-stage CKD with hopelessness, suicidal thoughts, degeneration
rubrics.modality: Feels beyond help, mentally withdrawn, or thoughts of death

rubrics.rubric: High blood pressure with kidney dysfunction and persistent proteinuria
rubrics.modality: Silent kidney damage with long-standing hypertension
rubrics.notes: Microscopic hematuria and glomerular sclerosis common

rubrics.rubric: Chronic hypertension with albuminuria and edema of face or lower limbs
rubrics.modality: Morning puffiness; tight shoes; tired eyes
rubrics.notes: Nephritic syndrome features from vascular pressure

rubrics.rubric: Sudden BP spike with headache, visual blur, renal shutdown
rubrics.modality: Pounding headache, red face, fear of death
rubrics.notes: Acute hypertensive emergency affecting kidney perfusion

rubrics.rubric: Hypertensive nephropathy in elderly with arteriosclerosis
rubrics.modality: Cerebral dullness, weakness, forgetfulness

rubrics.rubric: CKD with hypertension + heart weakness (cardiorenal syndrome)
rubrics.modality: Breathlessness, weak pulse, edema; needs propped sleep

rubrics.rubric: CKD with mental dullness, weak memory, anxiety, and irritability
rubrics.modality: Fatigued mind, irritable, poor sleep
rubrics.notes: Mental burnout from toxic accumulation and chronic illness

rubrics.rubric: CKD with systolic-diastolic mismatch: high systolic with weak pulse
rubrics.modality: Pulse slow but hard; syncopal spells

rubrics.rubric: CKD + hypertension with severe fatigue and heaviness in limbs
rubrics.modality: Burnout; needs rest all the time; worse heat
rubrics.notes: Vital exhaustion in long-standing BP–kidney issues

rubrics.rubric: CKD in hypertensive patients with diabetes and gout (triad)
rubrics.modality: Gouty joints, polyuria, renal pain, high BP
